what: Easily Install and Load Redistricting Software
title: Easily Install and Load Redistricting Software
text: redistverse set packages redistricting data downloading, spatial preprocessing, simulation, analysis, visualization. package makes easy install load multiple redistverse packages .

title: Easily Install and Load Redistricting Software
code: # install stable version from CRAN install.packages("redistverse") # development version remotes::install_github("alarm-redist/redistverse")

title: Easily Install and Load Redistricting Software
text: library(redistverse) loads core redistverse packages: redist redistmetrics ggredist geomander sf

title: Easily Install and Load Redistricting Software
text: Related packages installed: PL94171 tinytiger alarmdata easycensus censable birdie

what: redistverse: Easily Install and Load Redistricting Software — redistverse-package
title: redistverse: Easily Install and Load Redistricting Software — redistverse-package
text: Easy installation, loading, control packages redistricting data downloading, spatial data processing, simulation, analysis, visualization. package makes easy install load multiple 'redistverse' packages . 'redistverse' developed maintained Algorithm-Assisted Redistricting Methodology (ALARM) Project. details see https://alarm-redist.org.

title: redistverse: Easily Install and Load Redistricting Software — redistverse-package

title: redistverse 0.1.1
text: CRAN release: 2025-10-27 Upgrades tinytiger core package. Explicitly lists baf imported package, already implicit dependency via geomander.

title: redistverse 0.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-06-18 Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Initial CRAN release.
